The game itself is very good, I had my fair share of fun. But the there is a lot of bugs and glitches, and even when the devs fix it there is a whole 50+ other problems that come out!

Let me start by saying I do love this game, and will still play it.... because of my love for the Horror icons and genre, not because I support the Devs. But I cannot recommend it, out of spite for the devs. 

The developers are the worst I have ever seen. Each update continues their neglect for the community, and introduces more bugs/glitches/conflict than anything positive. They either thrive on the pain from their customer base, or are so naive it's incurable. Any given match, you will see 90% of Survivors running any combination of Decisive Strike / Dead Hard / Iron Will / Borrowed Time / Unbreakable / Spine Chill....that's it. Yes, those perks are powerful and arguably over-powered, but mostly because all the other perks are either very situational (maybe useful in 10% of matches) or outright useless...literally....useless. On the other hand, 95% of Killers right now run Ruin / Undying / Tinkerer / BBQ, because it's a super meta build. Now, I have no problem with meta builds, when being in a competitive environment (ACTUAL ranked gameplay)...but seeing the same boring builds on both sides results in the same stale gameplay every match. I play both sides, so I see it first hand. Most survivors will make dumb/insane risky plays, because they are carried by their perks...commence teabagging...rinse/repeat. Killers will slug/proxy, because it's an easy counter (most of the time). If the Dev's cared about spicing up their gameplay, they would rework 90% of perks on both Killer/Survivor sides, to add new builds and fun new ways to play the game.  But unfortunately, the only thing the Dev's are able to do, or care to do, is push bugs galore into the game and create new skins into the game. So, in conclusion: Dev's bad, players are (mostly) sweaty, the BP grind is HORRIBLE, and 95% of the events are absolutely pointless. Welcome to DBD! Bite the pillow, because the Dev's are coming in raw.

Lot of fun. Can be a little overwhelming in the begining and things do take some time to get rolling, but if you love horror and wanted to be in a horror movie... try this out. I don't think you'll be disappointed. There are some trolly players but you likely won't see them if you're not in an actual party with them. Fairly balanced system.

Adoro este juego porque a pesar de parecer simple o repetitivo, jamás se dan las mismas situaciones y la adrenalina y el terror del mismo hace que sea adictivo jugar siempre una vez más. Lejos, mi juego favorito. Una de las desventajas es que con la última actualización hay algunas pocas cosas que se bugean.

No conozco juego peor balanceado en mi vida, y llevo jugando a videojuegos desde que tengo 14 años. El concepto del juego en sí está muy guay, y el rol de los asesinos-personajes. El problema está en que, cuando juegas de superviviente, te dedicas básicamente a morir. El asesino es absurdamente superior a tí: Corre más, te mata de dos golpes (a distancias absurdas por cierto), tienen trampas, "colgadores" cada 4 metros, visión nocturna/avisos kilométricos, teletransportes... en fin. Es como enfrentar a un súperheroe villano con un... viandante/persona normal. Resumen: Concepto guay vs desproporción villano-superviviente que te quitan todas las posibles ganas de jugarlo. No lo recomiendo :)

İNCELEMENİZİ GÖZDEN GEÇİRMEK İSTER MİSİNİZ DİYE SORDU: EVET İSTERİM FİKİRLERİM HALA GEÇERLİ YAPACAĞINIZ OYUNU SİKEYİM

Edit 2: Daha sakin ve teknik bir şekilde yazıyorum. Ben bu oyunu yapımcısındaki her bireyin parmaklarını tek tek sikeyim. Behaviour kadar sik kafası başka bir firma daha yok amk. Yamayı ilgili yere atacağına 50 mb yama indirip tüm oyunu tekrar kuruyor. İndirme hızım 50 mb/s. 1 Saniyede patch'i indiriyorum. Ama 50 mb'lik patchi kurması için 33.9 GB dosyayı tekrar kurmaya çalışıyor :D Sikimi klavyeye vursam şu sikik oyundan daha iyi oyun kodlarım. Bağımlıysanız alternatiflerini arayın eminim şu sikik oyundan çok daha iyi bir oyun bulabilirsiniz.
